sense.def:
To have power
pomeni imeti vpliv na ljudi in dejavnosti.

seg.quote: It gave the President too much power.

sense.def:
One's power to do something
je človekova sposobnost, da nekaj dela.

seg.quote: They lose the power to walk.
They did not have the power of speech.

gramGrp.pos:
COUNT N
or
UNCOUNT N
with
SUPP

sense.def:
Kadar ima nekdo na odgovornem položaju
power to do something
, ima po zakonu pravico, da tisto dela.

seg.quote: The Government curbed the Lords' powers.
...the court's power to punish young offenders.

sense.def:
The power of something
je silovitost nečesa.

seg.quote: I underestimated the power of the explosion.

sense.def:
Power
je energija, ki jo dobimo s sežiganjem goriva ali z izkoriščanjem vetra ali sonca.

Power
je pogosto drug izraz za
electricity
.

To power a machine
pomeni stroju dajati energijo, da lahko deluje.

seg.quote: Its radar equipment was powered by a nuclear reactor.

sense.def:
To come to power
pomeni prevzeti odločanje o dogajanjih v državi.
To be in power
pomeni odločati o dogajanjih v državi.

cit.quote: priti na oblast, biti na oblasti

seg.quote: The Wilson Government came to power in 1964.
The Tories were in power at the time.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
within
ali
in someone's power
, je nekdo sposoben tisto narediti.

seg.quote: It may not be within their power to help.
I did everything in my power to console her.
